TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed MatchType extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: The enumeration specifies the type of comparison used in a search.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.MatchType Equals = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The search results include values that equal the supplied value. If the supplied value specifies a date and time, the returned collection includes objects that have the same date and time.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.MatchType GreaterThan = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The search results include values that are greater than the supplied value. If the supplied value specifies a date and time, the returned collection includes objects that are dated after the specified date and time.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.MatchType GreaterThanOrEquals = int32(3)

Docs.summary: The search results include values that are greater than or equal to the supplied value. If the supplied value specifies a date and time, the returned collection includes objects that are dated on or after the specified date and time.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.MatchType LessThan = int32(4)

Docs.summary: The search results include values that are less than the supplied value. If the supplied value specifies a date and time, the returned collection includes objects that are dated prior to the specified date and time.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.MatchType LessThanOrEquals = int32(5)

Docs.summary: The search results include values that are less than or equal to the supplied value. If the supplied value specifies a date and time, the returned collection includes objects that are dated prior to or on the specified date and time.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.MatchType NotEquals = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The search results include values that are not equal to the supplied value. If the supplied value specifies a date and time, the returned collection includes objects that do not include the specified date and time.
